title: semi-bold italic serif
author: t00lz

comments.content:
Perhaps a slightly customized (square off the leg of the |R|) version of Sydney Serial?:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/sydney-serial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130606/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/sydney-serial/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/softmaker/sydney-serial/")
That is pretty close! I should be able to modify what I need from that, thanks.
